column4: last night humble went to install xchat plugins , synaptic has downloaded packages and went to install after that a windows has been opened with asking libc6 upgrade , humble accepted it and hit forward it went rebooting but while booting it gave an error http://imagebin.org/87436

question is this : rep has been changed from9.04 to 9.10 , some packages have been installed , some are half-installed , ... NOW how to get list of packages that have been upgrade or corrupted or changed after  repository had been changed see dpkg.log http://pastebin.com/EEcE6bc9
don't want upgrade to 9.10 or reinstall
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
